name: Barbie Horse Adventures: Riding Camp
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Welcome to Riding Camp!



Embark on an amazing riding adventure! Train, race, and jump your horse as you compete in time trials and explore the countryside! At Riding Camp, the fun never stops, so saddle up!

  • Learn to saddle up, jump, train and ride variety of horse breeds!
  • Groom, feed, & care for your horse down to selecting your horse's blankets & equipment!
  • Play as Barbie and customize her riding clothes & accessories for non-stop fun!
  • Earn ribbons for outstanding performances as you compete with your horse!
